sugawara:physicaldata: ゆ　記年併記　合璧痕跡あり　khanya 官衙への申告
sugawara:personRoleA: Hajji Akhund b. Mulla Hasan Khwaja

schema:abstract: 12, Real Estate transfer(sale), Sha'ban 5, 1354(Nov.2, 1935), issued by Hajji Akhund valad-i Mulla Hasan Khwaja of Barin, to Nur Akhund valad-i Imin Akhund of (Kashghar) City, on the 4 charek of land located at  Barin.
